author: Antoinette Bueno
title: Pregnant Amal Clooney Stuns in Red: See the Glamorous Pic!
text: Pregnant Amal Clooney Stuns in Red: See the Glamorous Pic! by Antoinette Bueno 11:36   Photo: Splash News It's safe to say Amal Clooney's amazing style is only getting better with pregnancy. The 39-year-old human rights lawyer was spotted out and about in London, England, on Tuesday, covering up her baby bump with a floor-length, bright red coat. She wore a gray minidress with tights underneath, and finished off the fashionable look with black motorcycle ankle boots. Photo: Splash News PICS: Amal Clooney's Best Looks Earlier this month, The Talk 's Julie Chen announced Amal and husband George Clooney are expecting twins. The actor, 55, spoke about becoming a father for the first time during his interview with French film journalist Laurent Weil on the program Rencontres de Cinema , which aired on Sunday. "We are really happy and really excited," the Oscar winner said with a big smile. "It's going to be an adventure." "We've sort of embraced it allâ€¦ with arms wide open," he added about him and his wife's current attitude. At the 2017 NAACP Image Awards, ET spoke with another famous father of twins -- Denzel Washington -- who had some wise advice for Clooney about what he can expect. Washington's twins, Olivia and Malcolm Washington, are now 25 years old. "Sleep now!" the Fences actor joked. "Because you won't be sleeping then!" Watch below:
